briefTitle: Use of Omegaven for Treatment With Parenteral Nutrition Associated Liver Disease
officialTitle: Use of Omegaven for Treatment With Parenteral Nutrition Associated Liver Disease

interventions.name: Omegaven
otherNames: IV Fish Oil Based Lipid Emulsion

summary: To provide parenteral fat emulsion prepared from fish oil (omega-3 fatty acid emulsion, OmegavenÂ®) to patients with liver disease (PNALD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Disease Progression as Measured by Serum Levels of Hepatic Enzymes
